roleset.name: discovery
roleset.note: FIND-V NOTES: VN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls discover-84, get-13.5.1. (from find.01-v)
FINDING-N NOTES: Corresponds with find.01. Framed by anwen april 2011 (from finding.01-n)
FIND-N NOTES: Corresponds with find.01. Framed by anwen april 2011, lemma and examples updated by Claire. (from find.01-n)

roles.note: In "the findings of the study are inconclusive" it is not eventive (it is its own arg1). (from finding.01-n)

example.name: basic transitive
example.text: I-1'd like *trace*-1 to find a flight that goes from Boston to Orlando.
example.arg: a flight that goes from Boston to Orlando

example.name: found a sentence!
example.text: The study also found that the colony's consumers feel more pressured than those in any of the other surveyed markets.
example.arg: that the colony's consumers feel more pressured than those in any of the other surveyed markets

example.name: Arg0, Arg1
example.text: Carter and Herbert's finding of the tomb of Tutankhamun was significant.

example.name: Arg0, Arg1
example.text: Carter and Herbert's finding of the tomb of Tutankhamun was significant.

example.name: Within LVC
example.text: State engineers have made a preliminary finding that it was failure of the concrete columns , wrenched and separated from the double-decker roadbed , that was responsible for the collapse .
example.arg: that it was failure of the concrete columns , wrenched and separated from the double-decker roadbed , that was responsible for the collapse .

example.name: idiomatic
example.text: This place was a real find!

roleset.name: adjudge
roleset.note: FIND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'find' based on file created by Chris, survey of initial sentences of big corpus, and minimal comparison with 'receive', revised by Olga and Arrick (from find.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: with a small clause
example.text: State courts found the rates illegal.

roleset.name: discovery
roleset.note: FIND_OUT-V NOTES: Frame edited by Arrick. (from find.03-v)

example.name: discover
example.text: Most people have a strong deisre * to find out about it, so as a result they have * to pick up what they can *?* *T*-2.
